Comment: If Trump has even the smallest, itty bitty *inkling* of political savvy, he'll already know his presence has completely torpedoed the chances of "his guy" being elected up here and will stay away as far as possible until the election.  A few short months ago, everyone was absolutely sick of Justin Trudeau, the liberal party, and the Cons were looking to win in the largest landslide ever in Canadian political history. They were projecting over 240 seats at one point which is just insane.  Queue Trump. [Here's how the map looks like now](https://338canada.com/) - The largest landslide has turned into the biggest political turnabout ever solely because of Trump's actions. If Pierre actually lost this election, it would probably be the craziest event in Canada's history since it was almost inevitable he was going to win just a few short months before this.
